channel.title: An in depth user guide?
channel.description: Hi. I looked around on the homepage and on this forum but couldnt find an in depth user guide to modules/patching etc. I know im stupid, but where can i find it? Thanks:)

item.title: An in depth user guide?
item.dc:creator: @janvantomme Jan Vantomme
item.description:
@janvantomme wrote:

Best way to dive in is to check the examples that come with the patcher software. That's how most of us learned about patching. Most objects also have a help patch that shows how to use the object, and how it works. Click the triangle in the upper left corner of the object to see the code or open the help patch.

The book I wrote might also be handy if you want to learn about patching.

Getting Started with Axoloti, the Book Patching
Since the community is very new, and there aren't a lot of resources available to get started with patching, I've decided to write a book about Axoloti. The book will teach you how to create basic synthesizers, drum machines and audio effects. These are the chapters I've planned. The first chapter is available as a free sample. Chapter 1: Creating Your First Synthesizer Chapter 2: Creating a Polyphonic Synthesizer Chapter 3: Diving into Sound Design Chapter 4: Creating Drum Machines Chapte…

Read full topic
